verses.name: Esther 6:6
verses.text: So Haman came in. And the king said unto him, What shall be done unto the man whom the king delighteth to honour? Now Haman thought in his heart, To whom would the king delight to do honour more than to myself?

verses.name: Esther 6:7
verses.text: And Haman answered the king, For the man whom the king delighteth to honour,

verses.name: Esther 6:8
verses.text: Let the royal apparel be brought which the king useth to wear, and the horse that the king rideth upon, and the crown royal which is set upon his head:
